jobs: FixViolationMissingModalCancelTests: Add test spec entries for DealDetailPage modal cancel buttons (AddWriteup, AddTask, UploadAttachment modals) and corresponding Playwright tests - directive requires complete modal dialog testing
RunTests: Verify tests pass after modal cancel test additions

FixViolationTaskCompleteSideEffect: Fix DDP-LTK-04 test to verify timeline entry side effect when completing a task - the test currently only checks visual completion state but doesn't assert timeline entry is created exactly once
RunTests: Verify tests pass after task completion side effect fix
FixViolation: Add missing TasksListPage Navigation test entries in docs/tests.md and tasks-list-page.spec.ts (testSpec directive 2)
FixViolation: Add missing Cancel test for task creation modal in docs/tests.md and tasks-list-page.spec.ts (testSpec directive 7)
RunTests: Verify tests pass after test spec and test additions
FixViolation: Fix TLP-FLT-04 and TLP-FLT-05 tests that use native select API (selectOption/locator option) on custom FilterSelect components - must use trigger/menu/option testid pattern instead
RunTests: Verify tests pass after fixing filter tests
FixViolation: Add missing TLP-HDR-06 test spec entry for Cancel button on Create Task modal (like DLP-HDR-06 for deals) and write the corresponding Playwright test
RunTests: Verify tests pass after adding cancel modal test

FixViolation: Fix TaskPriorityBadge to use CSS variables for priority colors (add --color-priority-high etc to index.css @theme block like status colors) and remove outer margins from TasksPageHeader (mb-6) and TasksFilterBar (mb-4) root elements, moving spacing to parent TasksListPage
RunTests: Verify tests pass after component fixes

FixViolationTaskDetailSpecPersistence: Update test spec entries TDP-HDR-01 (add description check), TDP-HDR-02/TDP-NTS-02/TDP-NTS-03 (add persistence verification language), TDP-HDR-02 (add timeline side effect)
RunTests: Verify tests pass after TaskDetail spec persistence fix

FixViolationTaskDetailTestCompleteness: Fix TDP-HDR-01 test to verify priority badge, due date, assignee, client/deal names; Fix TDP-NTS-02 test to verify author and timestamp; Fix TDP-HDR-02 test to verify timeline side effect on client
RunTests: Verify tests pass after TaskDetail test completeness fix
FixViolationTaskDetailToPassAntiPattern: Replace .toPass() blocks containing auto-waiting assertions with direct assertions using timeout in task-detail-page.spec.ts (5 occurrences)
RunTests: Verify tests pass after TaskDetail toPass fix

FixViolation: Fix TDP-HDR-01 test entry to include description field, add missing test assertions for priority badge/due date/assignee/description/client-deal names, and add author/timestamp assertions to TDP-NTS-02 test
RunTests: Verify tests pass after TDP assertion fixes
FixViolation: Add confirm dialog dismissal test entry (TDP-HDR-05) and corresponding Playwright test - clicking Cancel in the confirm dialog should leave task unchanged
RunTests: Verify tests pass after confirm dialog dismissal fix

FixViolation: Make client/deal names in TaskDetailHeader navigable links to /clients/:clientId and /deals/:dealId, update test spec components section, add navigation test entries, and add Playwright tests for link navigation
RunTests: Verify tests pass after client/deal link fix

FixViolation: Replace 5 instances of .toPass() wrapping single auto-wait Playwright assertions in task-detail-page.spec.ts with direct assertion timeouts (e.g. .toBeVisible({ timeout: 10000 }) instead of expect(async () => { await expect(x).toBeVisible() }).toPass())
RunTests: Verify tests pass after .toPass() pattern fix
FixViolation: Add missing test entries for webhook enable/disable toggle (STP-WH-07) and edit webhook flow (STP-WH-08), add corresponding Playwright tests, and update components if needed
RunTests: Verify tests pass after webhook lifecycle fix

FixViolation: Add missing test entries for Import Deals/Tasks/Contacts buttons (STP-IE-03/04/05), Export buttons (STP-IE-06/07/08), and make STP-IE-02 specify expected CSV columns. Add corresponding Playwright tests
RunTests: Verify tests pass after import/export fix
FixViolation: Add data-testid attributes to UserActivitySection activity items for consistency with other sections
RunTests: Verify tests pass after fix
